<title level="1" right="Rules">[Alchemical Tools](/Rules.aspx?ID=3187)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 251 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Alchemical tools are [consumable](/Traits.aspx?ID=564) items you don’t drink.

[Click here for the Alchemical Tools category page](/Equipment.aspx?Category=6&Subcategory=10).
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Alchemical Tools
